content.en: Image quality assessment: Researchers have been exploring various algorithms to assess the quality of digital images without the need for a reference image. These algorithms, such as the GMSD algorithm, CNN-based models, and fusion-based metrics, have shown promising results in accurately predicting image quality. By combining different techniques, these algorithms are able to capture important features, improve performance, and provide better discriminatory power for image quality assessment.
content.da: Billedkvalitetsvurdering: Forskere har undersøgt forskellige algoritmer til at vurdere kvaliteten af digitale billeder uden behov for et referencebillede. Disse algoritmer, såsom GMSD-algoritmen, CNN-baserede modeller og fusion-baserede metoder, har vist lovende resultater i at forudsige billedkvalitet præcist. Ved at kombinere forskellige teknikker er disse algoritmer i stand til at fange vigtige karakteristika, forbedre ydeevnen og give bedre evne til at skelne ved billedkvalitetsvurdering.
